mapper.sql:
select aa.batch_no as batch_No ,aa.action_no as action_No,aa.Data_Msg as data_Msg, aa.state_flag as state_Flag,aa.action_msg as action_Msg,aa.ACTION_TYPE AS action_Type from t_def_action_trace aa where 1=1
AND aa.action_no in ${actionNos}
